title: After-School Programs
openingPara: Mina's School of Great Falls offers various after-school lessons starting at 3:00PM during the school days. We provide Math & Phonics tutoring lessons for any students who are searching for help, or if they are looking to solidfy some new concepts. We also offer Technology lessons for students who are curious about computers & have a chess club ever Friday at 3:00PM .

programDetails.title: Math Tutoring Lessons
programDetails.description: Mina's Elementary School offers an after-school math program.

programDetails.title: Phonics Tutoring Lessons
programDetails.description: Mina's Elementary School offers an after-school phonics program.

programDetails.title: Technology Tutoring Lessons
programDetails.description: Mina's Elementary School offers an after-school engineering & Technology program.

programDetails.title: Chess Club
programDetails.description: Mina's Elementary School offers an after-school chess program.
